title: How to Make a Kani Salad

steps.headline: Wash, peel, and cut the cucumber and carrots into matchstick pieces.
Shred the lettuce into bite sized pieces.
Shred the crab sticks into strips.
Toss the cucumber, carrots, and lettuce in a bowl with the mayonnaise.
Layer the crab sticks on the top.
Chill the mixture until ready to serve.

text: Wash, peel, and cut the cucumber and carrots into matchstick pieces.  Shred the lettuce into bite sized pieces.  Shred the crab sticks into strips.  Toss the cucumber, carrots, and lettuce in a bowl with the mayonnaise.  Layer the crab sticks on the top.  Chill the mixture until ready to serve.  Finished.
